code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{useCookies}from"react-cookie";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import'./shopper.signout.css';import{Dropdown}from"react-bootstrap";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ShopperSignout=()=>{const[cookies,setCookie,removeCookie]=useCookies(["user"]);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{if(!cookies["userId"]){navigate("/login");}},[]);const SignoutClick=()=>{removeCookie("userId");navigate("/login");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Dropdown,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dropdown.Toggle,{variant:"success",id:"dropdown-basic",children:cookies["userId"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dropdown.Menu,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dropdown.Item,{href:"#/login",onClick:SignoutClick,className:"signout p-2 text-center",children:"Sign out"})})]});};export default ShopperSignout;
